resources.string: yacv needs your permission to read comic in your phone.
No folder selected to scan for comics. Click the Folder icon to select one.
Selected Folder cannot be read. Either the read permission was revoked, or the folder was deleted. Click the Folder icon to select another one.
Read permission not granted. Click here to grant yacv one.
Looks like it\'s empty here. Consider adding more comics, or click the Folder icon to choose another folder to scan for comics.
yacv has been denied twice. yacv can not read comics. Allow yacv by open Settings and give yacv a chance!
